mapper.select:
select si.id, si.num, si.theme, si.dept_id, si.staff_id, si.content, si.create_date, si2.name, si2.images from scrap_info si left join student_info si2 on (si2.id = si.staff_id) where 1 = 1
AND num LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scrapInfo.num},'%')
AND theme LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scrapInfo.theme},'%')
order by si2.create_date desc
